data.title: Things To Do This Week in Newport, RI
data.meta_description: Discover things to do this weekend in Newport, RI. Browse our events calendar, brimming with exciting weekly experiences and events on The Classic Coast.
data.text:
Newport Mini Golf

Recurring weekly on Tuesday

Head on down to Newport Mini Golf on Tuesdays, when children under 12 play for $12! Win a pair of Captain Lucky Puttz aviator sunglasses with a hole-in-one! One per customer. Get ready for some family fun! Fore!

Stoneacre Brasserie

Recurring every week day

Tea on the square is a daily celebration and way to turn back time to an age old tradition.

Newport Vineyards

Recurring weekly on Tuesday

The total tasting package is here! Join us every Tuesday at our wine tasting or walk-up bars to enjoy four of our favorite wines paired with two chef-selected cheeses and two house-made chocolates. Special ($36) includes tasting flight of four featured wines, two fudgey‚Ä¶

Coastal Queen Cruises, from Jamestown

Watch the sun set aboard Coastal Queen while The Narrow River Band plays hits from The Beatles and James Taylor, along with some jazz and favorite dance tunes. The boat is cozy and spacious indoors and the top deck is covered for pleasant cruising. The cruise is 90-minutes‚Ä¶

Spring Bull Studio & Gallery

Recurring daily

Coastal Rhythms An Art Exhibition at Spring Bull Gallery August 3 - September 15, 2024 Opening Reception: August 10th, 4:00 - 6:00 PM Whether it‚Äôs the rhythm of waves crashing onto the rocks or sandy shores carved by the tides, Spring Bull‚Äôs ‚ÄúCoastal Rhythms‚Äù exhibit explores the‚Ä¶

Newport Art Museum

Jeff Weston is a Rhode Island "Prodigal Son‚Äù who grew up in Bristol, Rhode Island. He went to the University of Connecticut where he was an accounting major and also attained a master‚Äôs degree from Fairfield University. As a very successful marketing executive he retired eight‚Ä¶

Blithewold Manor, Gardens & Arboretum

Recurring every 2 weeks on Tuesday

Join us to follow the flow of the seasons in the Blithewold Gardens. Sketchbook journaling combines writing and drawing to tell the story of the gardens we see. Instructor Thea Ernest will lead exercises in designing and filling your sketch journal as we work plein air style‚Ä¶

Recurring weekly on Tuesday

May is Mental Health Awareness Month! Join us for Neurographic Art for the Mind, a May Quest offered by Recharge Newport at the Self-Esteem Through Art studio on Aquidneck Avenue in Middletown to learn a simple yet effective creative technique for quieting the mind. No art‚Ä¶

Recurring weekly on Tuesday

New class location VFW Post 5390 822 Anthony Rd. Portsmouth, R.I. Tuesday nights are caliente!! 6:00 PM: Beginner 7:00 PM: Accomplished

Love Defeats Fear Yoga

Recurring weekly on Tuesday

Join us every Tuesday evening this summer for a rejuvenating yoga session at Third Beach, where the natural beauty of the beach and the calming sounds of the ocean create the perfect backdrop for your practice. This class is designed for all levels, whether you're a seasoned yogi‚Ä¶

Fifth Element

Recurring weekly on Wednesday

Multi-talented singer/songwriter brings her talents to Fifth Element every Wednesday night. Enjoy hearing some of your favorite songs while indulging in one of Fifths farm to table offerings.

Aquidneck Grower's Farmers Market

Recurring weekly on Wednesday

Aquidneck Community Table hosts Wednesdays on Memorial in Newport on Wednesday afternoons from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM from May 22 - October 30. Aquidneck Community Table‚Äôs Growers Markets provide easy access to seasonal, regionally-grown food and greater awareness of the benefits of‚Ä¶

The Grand Bellevue - Rail Dining Experience

Our Autumn Luncheon runs every other Wednesday at noon, and it includes a 1:45 train ride, three lunch courses, coffee, tea, and espresso. Dates: Aug 14, Aug 28, Sept 11, Sept 25, Oct 9, Oct 23, Nov 6, and Nov 20.

Third Beach

Recurring weekly on Monday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday

Strengthen and lengthen your muscles from core to limb with a low-impact mat Pilates class at Third Beach. Steady, effective movements target specific muscle groups and joints to leave you feeling ready to take on challenges on and off the mat. Classes take place every Monday‚Ä¶

Blithewold Manor, Gardens & Arboretum

Spread out the picnic, soak up the warmth of the summer sun over Narragansett Bay, and enjoy a variety of musical performances by local musicians. Wednesday nights at Blithewold are the perfect way to enjoy summer with friends and family! Guests are encouraged to bring picnic‚Ä¶

Forty 1¬∞ North

Recurring weekly on Wednesday

Fermentation Class: Featuring five wine tastings with a special theme or from a particular region accompanied by five small food pairings, Fermentation Class is held at the Oval Bar every Wednesday at 6:30. Reservations are required and this class often sells out. Please sign up‚Ä¶

Recurring weekly on Wednesday

Developed by the operators of Hope & Main in Warren, the Schoolyard Market helps locally-based food and beverage businesses start up, scale and thrive. This year's markets feature approximately 30 vendors and is held outside a century-old converted school building with plenty‚Ä¶

Schooner Aurora

Recurring weekly on Wednesday

Enjoy lunch aboard Schooner Aurora with a two-hour afternoon sail through Newport Harbor and Narragansett Bay.

Pivotal Brewing Company

Recurring weekly on Wednesday, Thursday

McCaughey Standard Trivia is here every Wednesday night from 6:30 - 8:30 PM. Grab your friends and join us for some tasty beers, brain-teasing questions, a little friendly competition, and prizes.

Recurring weekly on Wednesday, Friday, Saturday

Newport Foodies Stroll offers a 1.75 miles walking food tour through Lower Thames Street. You will learn about the "City by the Sea", as well as try the cuisine from five of the best locally owned restaurants. The best time to schedule your tour is at the beginning of your visit‚Ä¶

Norman Bird Sanctuary

Recurring weekly on Wednesday, Saturday

We invite you to join us Saturday & Wednesday mornings (weather permitting) from 10:00-11:15 outdoors on Mabel's Studio lawn for these unique, slow-paced, grounding and inspiring yoga classes where the sense of community is strong and truly heart-warming. Come, find your‚Ä¶

OceanCliff

Recurring weekly on Wednesday

Join us on the Safari Room lawn on Wednesdays beginning July 3rd for our Rose all WednesDAY series. Grab an Adirondack chair and take advantage of the breathtaking views while enjoying a glass of wine and a bite to eat with friends. We‚Äôll be featuring a special Whispering Angel‚Ä¶

Newport Vineyards

Recurring weekly on Wednesday

Join us for our Wednesday live music series by the vines! Enjoy wine or beer tasting flights, a glass, dinner or a bite while you enjoy the tunes! Bring a chair / blanket and order at the bar to hang by the vines. The music will be outside, weather pending, near the covered‚Ä¶

Carmen and Ginger

Recurring daily

Peter Lanouette Art Exhibit: ArtNight Bristol Warren Carmen & Ginger is pleased to host an exhibit of the artwork of Peter Lanouette this coming August and September. The exhibit opens during the last ArtNight Bristol Warren of the season, with other galleries, retail‚Ä¶

Recurring weekly on Thursday

Classes are designed to welcome adult dancers of all ages and abilities. These classes offer a fun way for dancers to exercise, meet new friends, and enjoy movement! (Instagram: @theacademyatncb)

The Butts Hill Fort Restoration Committee (BHFRC) of the Battle of Rhode Island Association (BoRIA) will hold a wreath laying ceremony with a musket salute on the 246th anniversary of the Battle of Rhode Island Thursday August 29th at 7:00 PM at Butts Hill Fort in Portsmouth, RI‚Ä¶

Made in Warren Artist Cooperative

Art Night returns to Warren on August 29th where studios and shops along Water Street and inside The Handkerchief Factory on Main Street will be open for visitors from 5:30 - 8:30 PM. From open studios to live music and performances, Art Night is the place to be for visitors of‚Ä¶

The Chanler at Cliff Walk

Experience the essence of Italy this summer at the Ca' del Bosco Wine Garden, where the tantalizing scent of authentic Italian pizza mingles with the fragrance of blooming flowers. Relax in Adirondack chairs beneath the dappled shade of umbrellas, sip on Franciacorta wine and‚Ä¶

5:00 PM: Venue Opens 6:20 PM: Live Music by Thirsty Boots 7:30 PM: Film Begins ABOUT THE FILM: A moving lesson in empathy and forgiveness, Daughters is a result of an eight-year documentary journey that filmmaker Natalie Rae and Angela Patton, an activist advocating for‚Ä¶

Recurring weekly on Thursday, Friday, Saturday

Are you ready for a Magical Mini Retreat? We have designed this mini retreat with you in mind! Immerse yourselves in the City by the Sea as you touch on the most important elements of your relationship with the guidance of our Gottman Institute certified couples coach! Have fun‚Ä¶

Newport Neighborhood Food Tour

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

During your Newport Neighborhood Tour, you will discover diverse, eclectic out-of-the-way neighborhood eateries ‚Äì with a homespun vibe, where the locals know to go as well as hotbeds of food and fun in the less traveled parts of the city. Step inside some of what may appear‚Ä¶

Newport Historical Society Walking Tours

In 1777 as the Revolutionary War officially began, 7,000 British and Hessian soldiers invaded Newport, creating an occupation that lasted for nearly 3 years. On August 29th, the 246th anniversary of the Battle of Rhode Island, join the Newport Historical Society for a special‚Ä¶

Blithewold Manor, Gardens & Arboretum

Recurring weekly on Thursday, Friday

Enjoy freshly baked pastries on our beautiful porch overlooking Narragansett Bay. Choose from the daily selection of delicacies to enjoy with coffee or Blithewold‚Äôs house tea blend. Sit back, take in the view, and relax. It‚Äôs a Blithwold tradition! Important Information: We have‚Ä¶

Stoneacre Garden

Recurring weekly on Thursday

Every Thursday stoneacre garden hosts sushi and live music for the summer season! Band Residency: 1st week of the Month: Los Duderinos 2nd week of the Month: Dave Alves Trio 3rd & 4th week of the month are rotating bands.

The Living Room at Brenton Hotel

The Newport Artist Collective is launching a new series called ‚ÄúThe Salon Series in the Library of the Brenton Hotel‚Äù which highlights a different artist or gallery every Thursday night from 5:00 ‚Äì 7:00. The Salon is designed to provide hotel guests and the Newport‚Ä¶

Pivotal Brewing Company

Recurring weekly on Thursday

This summer, join us and our neighbors at O‚ÄôBrien & Brough for "Summer Sessions in the Alley" every Thursday night! Grab a fire pit and indulge in delicious jams and even tastier beverages while enjoying Bristol's beautiful summer nights. We'll be featuring DJ Schlager Gala‚Ä¶

Recharge Newport

Recurring weekly on Friday

Join us for a Couples Retreat mini session! Get more information regarding our 4 types of couples retreats (mini, one, two, and three day), enjoy a tropical beverage, treats, luau themed decor, and a Love Language assessment as part of this 30 minute session!

Newport Vineyards

Recurring weekly on Friday

Introducing your new Friday ritual: Pint and a Pound Fridays! Grab a pound of Maine mussels steamed in Taproot‚Äôs famous Vineyard Pils and served with herb drawn butter, and receive a pint or glass of wine of your choice to go with it! All for just $15! Available all day while‚Ä¶

Newport Pride Center

Recurring monthly on the last Friday

On the last Friday of each month from 6:00 - 7:00 PM, join us for a delightful evening where we come together to celebrate community, laughter, and meaningful connections. Last Friday Social! is all about creating a space where individuals from diverse backgrounds can mingle‚Ä¶

Herreshoff Marine Museum

Every Friday, 10am - 4pm, June 7 to August 30, on the Herreshoff Waterfront! (excluding June 21 & August 23) Featuring: Artisans & Small Businesses, Live Music, Ice Cream & Food Trucks Dive into the summer spirit at the Herreshoff Museum Art & Artisan Market!‚Ä¶

Newport Vineyards

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Friday, Saturday

Every weekend feels like a holiday when you‚Äôre hanging vineyard-side! Enjoy wine & beer tastings, specialty drinks like our famous sangria slushies, and food station bites from our farm-to-table menu on our Tank Patio. All items available a la carte from our food and beverage‚Ä¶

Firehouse Theater

Recurring weekly on Friday, Saturday

The Bit Players are a fast paced and energized group of improvisation master-minds. Their high energy LIVE shows are modeled after the hit TV show ‚ÄúWhose Line is it Anyway?‚Äù. Full of hysterical characters, hilarious games, and side-splitting musical numbers these shows will leave‚Ä¶

Aquidneck Grower's Farmers Market

Recurring weekly on Saturday

Aquidneck Community Table's (ACT) winter market is held on Saturday mornings at Embrace Home Loans at 25 Enterprise Dr in Middletown. The market hours are 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM from May 4 - October 26. Aquidneck Community Table‚Äôs Growers Markets provide easy access to seasonal‚Ä¶

Finish off the final summer fun with a Campfire Sing! Beloved Coggeshall favorites Elwood Donnelly and Aubrey Atwater, return to Coggeshall on this late summer evening to present an old-fashioned sing-along around our campfire. Atwater Donnelly will sing new songs and old songs‚Ä¶

Mount Hope Farm

Recurring weekly on Saturday

Our year-round farmers market happens every Saturday morning. Swing by to pick up your local produce, bread, meat, fish, kombucha, and more each week as well as listen to live music in the summer, connect with local nonprofits and community organizations, and visit with friends!‚Ä¶

Island Cemetery Newport

Highlights of Island Cemetery Tour While Island Cemetery is the final resting place of hundreds of notable people, this tour focuses on about a dozen selected individuals. Among the stops on this tour are military heroes, architects, real estate tycoons, civil rights activist‚Ä¶

Greenvale Vineyards

Recurring weekly on Saturday

üé∂ Join Us for Free Live Jazz Music Every Saturday 12pm - 3pm May through November! üé∂ Wine tastings, flights or by the glass are available for purchase, pair them with local artisan bites. Rhody Raw Bars will be here on select Saturday's shucking oysters. August 24: Featuring‚Ä¶

Newport International Polo Series

Recurring weekly on Saturday

Watch the home team, USA/Newport, take on challengers from around the world and major U.S. cities in one of the most exciting spectator sports in the world. Matches are held every Saturday, June ‚Äì Sept., at Newport Polo, home of America‚Äôs First Polo Club. Festivities‚Ä¶

Recurring weekly on Saturday

Shops at Long Wharf Free Summer Concert Series are back! Please join us again this season for a summer of free concerts in Downtown Newport every Saturday, May 25th to October 5th. The Schedule May 25: In Tandem June 1: Y Not 3 June 8: John and Joanne June 15: Llana Katz Katz‚Ä¶
